lines.text: Here we are, Pismo Beach and all the clams we can eat!

[sung]
I dream of Genie, she's a light brown hare.
What a way for a duck to travel, underground.
I was once a human being, but that rotten kid in there was my undoing. He doesn't need a storyteller, he needs an exorcist!
Whoever heard of a cat eating porridge? Why can't we have a mouse like other pussycats?
These old ears have heard tell of a land called Hollywood, where storytellers abound. Perhaps we could bring some over, as hostages?
You want me to tell stories to that? I'd rather throw peanuts at it.
Let me tell you a story about a singing frog
A FROG? But frogs don't sing!
Since when is Pismo Beach inside a cave?
I don't like porridge! I want a mouse!
You'll eat your porridge and like it!
I'll eat it. But I won't like it!
She serving time in Tehachapi for breaking in and entering.
I thought I taw a itty, bitty putty tat!
